author: jdcasey
msg: making a route-m aware variant of the aether-connector-wagon project. Adding code to init the ArtifactRouter in the session data

author: jdcasey
msg: starting to add wrapper to repository management, to enable group routing behind-the-scenes. NOTE: This may need to go in maven-core, to enable the use of LegacySupport to get at the ArtifactRouter instance...

author: jdcasey
msg: group/mirror routing integrated, up to the point where the group routes need to be queried (from the artifact resolver). Still debating how to override some of this aether code...

author: jdcasey
msg: Refactoring route-M implementation to separate module, then starting to add in notion of groupId-to-canonical-URL mapping to allow fragmentation of repos along groupId lines.
